name: aws-lambda-base
description: Proyecto base para un nuevo aws lambda

scripts.local: npm run init && tsc && node-lambda run -j './events/evento1.json'
scripts.new:updDependencies: npm version --no-git-tag-version patch && git add . && git commit -m '[UPD]' -e && git push
scripts.new:FIX: npm version --no-git-tag-version patch && git add . && git commit -m '[FIX]' -e && git push
scripts.new:REFACTOR: npm version --no-git-tag-version patch && git add . && git commit -m '[REFACTOR]' -e && git push
scripts.new:FEAT: npm version --no-git-tag-version minor && git add . && git commit -m '[FEAT]' -e && git push
scripts.new:noDeploy: git add . && git commit -m '[NODEPLOY]' -e && git push

author: Manuel Rioseco
